analysis.description:
P3DRaffle.validateraffle (/unique_chucks/10/0x989eb9629225b8c06997ef0577cc08535fd789f9.sol#205-237) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- winner.transfer(jackpot) (/unique_chucks/10/0x989eb9629225b8c06997ef0577cc08535fd789f9.sol#233)
	- winner.transfer(100000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/10/0x989eb9629225b8c06997ef0577cc08535fd789f9.sol#234-235)
	- msg.sender.transfer(3000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/10/0x989eb9629225b8c06997ef0577cc08535fd789f9.sol#235)

Reentrancy in P3DRaffle.devfeetodev (/unique_chucks/10/0x989eb9629225b8c06997ef0577cc08535fd789f9.sol#188-192):
	External calls:
	- SPASM_.disburse.value(devfee)() (/unique_chucks/10/0x989eb9629225b8c06997ef0577cc08535fd789f9.sol#190-192)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- devfee (/unique_chucks/10/0x989eb9629225b8c06997ef0577cc08535fd789f9.sol#192)

P3DRaffle.buytickets (/unique_chucks/10/0x989eb9629225b8c06997ef0577cc08535fd789f9.sol#161-175) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-P3Dcontract_.buy.value(msg.value)(masternode) (/unique_chucks/10/0x989eb9629225b8c06997ef0577cc08535fd789f9.sol#175)

Reentrancy in P3DRaffle.fetchdivstopot (/unique_chucks/10/0x989eb9629225b8c06997ef0577cc08535fd789f9.sol#175-188):
	External calls:
	- divs = harvestabledivs() (/unique_chucks/10/0x989eb9629225b8c06997ef0577cc08535fd789f9.sol#176)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- devfee (/unique_chucks/10/0x989eb9629225b8c06997ef0577cc08535fd789f9.sol#187)
	- jackpot (/unique_chucks/10/0x989eb9629225b8c06997ef0577cc08535fd789f9.sol#183-184)
	- rafflepot (/unique_chucks/10/0x989eb9629225b8c06997ef0577cc08535fd789f9.sol#179-182)
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/10/0x989eb9629225b8c06997ef0577cc08535fd789f9.sol#60-62) is not in mixedCase
